summary: French civilization in the desert. Saganne is of peasant stock, with courage and a forceful will. In 1911, he volunteers and is posted to the Sahara under the aristocratic Colonel Dubreuilh... See full summary »
cast: Gérard Depardieu|Philippe Noiret|Catherine Deneuve|Sophie Marceau|Michel Duchaussoy|Roger Dumas|Jean-Louis Richard|Jean-Laurent Cochet|Pierre Tornade|Saïd Amadis|René Clermont|Philippe Deplanche|Hippolyte Girardot|Sophie Grimaldi|Florent Pagny|Robin Renucci|Salah Teskouk|Djamel Allam|Daniel Aubert|Teddy Bilis|Nicole Camus|Med Salah Cheurfi|Helga Hertzog|El Kebir|Grégoire Lavollay-Porter|Laurent Lavollay-Porter|Dahbia Maouch|Charles Marosi|Hadrami Ould Meidah|Myriam Perigois|Ernest von Rintelen|Catherine Rethi|Zakia Tahri|Lounès Tazairt|Tatiana Vialle
title: Fort Saganne
